intro: Roll through the stars. React, survive, repeat.
description: Galaxy Roll drops you into a sleek, cosmic world where your reflexes are the only thing standing between survival and the void. Controlling a rolling cube on a floating isometric track, you’ll dodge deadly gaps and lethal spikes using nothing more than the triggers on your controller. With every run, the challenge ramps up—collect coins, activate unpredictable power-ups, and try to outdo your last distance. The controls are tight and simple, but the tension is real. One wrong move, and it's over. Surrounded by minimalist sci-fi visuals and ambient space vibes, you’ll find yourself in a focused rhythm, chasing that next high score or unlocking new cube skins with every coin you gather. Whether you're in it for a quick session or a long leaderboard climb, Galaxy Roll is all about flow, precision, and pushing a little farther through the stars.
